SLACKIRC_NICKNAME.description: The username of your slackirc bot

SLACKIRC_SERVER.description: The IRC server to connect to (defaults to chat.freenode.net)

SLACKIRC_TOKEN.description: The API token for your slackirc bot

SLACKIRC_CHANNELS.description: A CSV channel mapping of slack channels to IRC channels. E.g. bevry,docpad,historyjs:history.js)
